content.en: Algorithmic advancements: Researchers have been using algorithms to improve the accuracy and efficiency of various processes in radiation therapy. These algorithms are being used to automate tasks such as patient repositioning, image registration, and verification of patient position. They are also being used to develop new methods for image registration and evaluation, as well as to analyze setup uncertainties and develop imaging protocols. Overall, algorithms are playing a crucial role in improving the effectiveness of radiation therapy treatments.
content.da: Algoritmefremskridt: Forskere har brugt algoritmer til at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af forskellige processer i strålebehandling. Disse algoritmer bliver brugt til at automatisere opgaver som patientrepositionering, billedregistrering og verificering af patientposition. De bliver også brugt til at udvikle nye metoder til billedregistrering og evaluering samt til at analysere opsætningsusikkerheder og udvikle billeddannelsesprotokoller. Overordnet set spiller algoritmer en afgørende rolle i at forbedre effektiviteten af strålebehandling.
